parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: User ID of the player that triggered the hint.

parameters.name: hint_entindex
parameters.description: Entity id of the env_instructor_hint that fired the event.

parameters.name: hint_name
parameters.description: What to name the hint. For referencing it again later (e.g. a kill command for the hint instead of a timeout).

parameters.name: hint_replace_key
parameters.description: Type name so that messages of the same type will replace each other.
parameters.description_cn: 用于替换现有提示的键值

parameters.name: hint_target
parameters.description: Entity id that the hint should display at.

parameters.name: hint_timeout
parameters.description: How long in seconds until the hint automatically times out, 0 = never.

parameters.name: hint_icon_onscreen
parameters.description: The hint icon to use when the hint is onscreen. e.g. "icon_alert_red".
parameters.description_cn: 屏幕内显示的图标路径

parameters.name: hint_icon_offscreen
parameters.description: The hint icon to use when the hint is offscreen. e.g. "icon_alert".
parameters.description_cn: 屏幕外显示的图标路径

parameters.name: hint_activator_caption
parameters.description: The hint caption that only the activator sees e.g. "#YouPushedItGood".
parameters.description_cn: 触发者相关的提示文本

parameters.name: hint_color
parameters.description: The hint color in "r,g,b" format where each component is 0-255.

parameters.name: hint_icon_offset
parameters.description: How far on the z axis to offset the hint from entity origin.

parameters.name: hint_range
parameters.description: Range before the hint is culled.

parameters.name: hint_binding
parameters.description: Bindings to use when use_binding is the onscreen icon.

parameters.name: hint_allow_nodraw_target
parameters.description: If false, the hint will dissappear if the target entity is invisible.

parameters.name: hint_nooffscreen
parameters.description: If true, the hint will not show when outside the player view.

parameters.name: hint_forcecaption
parameters.description: If true, the hint caption will show even if the hint is occluded.

parameters.name: hint_local_player_only
parameters.description: If true, only the local player will see the hint.

parameters.name: hint_vr_panel_type
parameters.description: Attachment type for the Panorama panel.
